title: Process a Return to Stock
description: A returned item has been inspected and deemed resalable. An operator must return it to inventory.

tasks.description: Scan the RMA number on the returned product to retrieve its details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the item and its inspection status ('OK for Restock').

tasks.description: Generate a put-away task for the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: The WMS suggests an optimal storage location for the item.

tasks.description: Move the item to the suggested location, scan the location and item to confirm, and finalize the task.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully restocks the item, and the system inventory is updated.
